message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. After careful consideration, we propose a purchase price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but this offer reflects our commitment to fair valuation while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.
